trigger: Exposed or spliced wiring without a junction box
action_item: Install proper junction box and secure with listed cover plate before weatherization activities.
documentation: Photo of corrected wiring and box; inspection note in job file.
policy_text: All electrical splices must be contained within code-compliant junction boxes and covered.

action_item: Refer to a licensed electrician for correction before proceeding. Weatherization work is deferred until correction is verified.
documentation: Photo of panel, electrician's report or sign-off.
policy_text: Multiple conductors on a single breaker can cause overheating and fire risk.

trigger: Knob-and-tube wiring present in work area
action_item: Defer insulation and weatherization in affected area until wiring is abated by a licensed electrician.
documentation: Photo of K&T wiring, location notes, abatement report.
policy_text: Insulating over active knob-and-tube wiring is prohibited due to fire hazard.

action_item: Refer for wiring assessment or additional outlet installation. Document correction before proceeding.
documentation: Photo of extension cord setup, electrician's notes.
policy_text: Extension cords may not be used as permanent wiring for appliances or outlets.

trigger: Missing or broken ground fault circuit interrupter (GFCI) in required locations
action_item: Install or repair GFCI outlets in kitchens, bathrooms, and exterior locations per code. Test for operation before and after weatherization.
documentation: Photo of GFCI installation/test, test report.
policy_text: GFCIs required in wet locations for occupant safety.
